Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipati
37.
1760Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  sekkhe khandhe saṃsaṭṭho sekkho adhipati. (1)
1761Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  asekkhe khandhe saṃsaṭṭho asekkho adhipati. (1)
1762Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṃ, ekaṃ.)
